mapper.select: SELECT TERMINAL_ID,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_TXT_STATUS WHERE TERMINAL_ID = #{rmTerminalID} AND CREATE_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{stIND_DT},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endIND_DT},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') GROUP BY TERMINAL_ID

SELECT CREATETIME FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS CREATETIME FROM TB_TXT_STATUS WHERE TERMINAL_ID = #{rmTerminalArr} AND CREATE_DATE >= STR_TO_DATE(#{stIND_DT},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A limit 1

SELECT TERMINAL_ID,COUNT(*) AS "CNT" FROM TB_TXT_STATUS WHERE TERMINAL_ID = #{terminal} AND CREATE_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{stIND_DT},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endIND_DT},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') GROUP BY TERMINAL_ID
